get.summary: Get the execution graph of a case summary workflow.
get.description:
Retrieves the execution graph for a given case summary workflow.

The graph provides a tree-like structure of the steps performed during the workflow execution,
including their status and timing.

schema.description: The steps in the workflow execution graph

get.summary: Get a visual representation of the execution graph.
get.description:
Retrieves a visual representation (SVG or JPEG) of the execution graph for a case summary workflow.

This requires the `graphviz` system package and the `pydot` and `graphviz` Python libraries to be installed.

200.description: The execution graph as an SVG or JPEG image.

schema.title: Response Photo Analyzer Status Api Workflows Photo Analyzer  Workflow Id  Status Get

post.description:
[DEPRECATED] Generates a presigned URL for a pre-generated PDF report.

This endpoint is provided for backward compatibility. It takes the JSON output
of a Photo Analyzer workflow and returns a redirect to the S3 URL of the
pre-generated report, avoiding on-the-fly PDF generation.

The recommended way to download reports is via the GET endpoint:
`/api/workflows/photo-analyzer/{workflow_id}/download?mode=<mode>`

parameters.name: verbose

schema.description: Download the full verbose report or the concise version.
schema.title: Verbose

parameters.description: Download the full verbose report or the concise version.

get.description:
Downloads a PDF report for a completed workflow, optionally regenerating it first.

- If `regenerate=false` (default): Immediately returns a redirect to the pre-generated PDF report in S3.
- If `regenerate=true`: Starts a workflow to regenerate all reports, waits for it to complete,
  and then returns a redirect to the newly created PDF. This is a synchronous, blocking call.

parameters.name: verbose

schema.description: [DEPRECATED] Use 'mode' instead. Download the full verbose report or the concise version.
schema.title: Verbose

parameters.description: [DEPRECATED] Use 'mode' instead. Download the full verbose report or the concise version.

parameters.name: mode

schema.description: Specify the report version to download: 'full', 'concise', or 'minimal'.
schema.title: Mode

parameters.description: Specify the report version to download: 'full', 'concise', or 'minimal'.

parameters.name: regenerate

schema.description: If true, regenerates the reports synchronously and returns a redirect to the newly generated file.
schema.title: Regenerate

parameters.description: If true, regenerates the reports synchronously and returns a redirect to the newly generated file.

get.description:
Polls for the status and results of a RelationToolAllWorkflow execution.

**Frontend Integration:**

The response contains an `intermediate_results` object with two key arrays for managing drafts and their
evaluations:
-   `create_reply_results`: A list of all generated drafts. Each draft is a `CreateReplyOutput` object and has a
    unique `draft_id`. Drafts are versioned sequentially (e.g., `..._v1`, `..._v2`).
-   `draft_evaluation_results`: A flat list of all evaluations performed across all drafts. Each evaluation is a
    `ReplyGradeOutput` object.

To display the latest evaluation for each draft version, you need to:
1.  Group the `draft_evaluation_results` by their `draft_id`.
2.  For each draft in `create_reply_results`, find the corresponding group of evaluations.
3.  The latest evaluation for a given draft is the last one in its group. A draft may have multiple evaluations.

The `draft_id` follows a consistent pattern: `{main_workflow_id}_v{version_number}`.
For example: `relationtool-abcde_v1`, `relationtool-abcde_v2`.

schema.title: Response Relationtool Status Api Workflows Relationtool  Workflow Id  Status Get

get.description: Downloads the relation table as an Excel file.

Downloads a reply draft as a DOCX file.

**Frontend Integration:**
-   The `version` query parameter is a zero-based index into the `create_reply_results` array from the status
    endpoint.
-   It supports negative indexing (e.g., `-1` for the latest version).
-   If `version` is not provided, the endpoint attempts to download the draft marked as "selected" within the
    workflow.
-   If no draft is selected, it defaults to the latest version (`-1`).
-   The downloaded filename will indicate the version number (e.g., `...-v1.docx`, `...-v2.docx`).

parameters.name: version

schema.description: Draft version to download by index. Supports negative indexing (-1 for latest). If not provided, the selected default draft is used.
schema.title: Version

parameters.description: Draft version to download by index. Supports negative indexing (-1 for latest). If not provided, the selected default draft is used.

This endpoint detects the workflow type and returns a unified response.

Manually completes a running RelationToolAllWorkflow.

schema.title: Response Relationtool Complete Api Workflows Relationtool  Workflow Id  Complete Post

post.description:
Adds manual feedback to the workflow, triggering a new draft generation and evaluation cycle.
Accepts either a full 'grade' object or a simple 'feedbacks' list.
If the request body is empty, it regenerates based on the last state.
This endpoint returns immediately.

**Frontend Integration:**
-   Use this to ask the AI to create a new, improved draft based on feedback.
-   This will create a new version (e.g., v2, v3) which will appear in the `create_reply_results` list.
-   A corresponding evaluation will also be created and added to `draft_evaluation_results`.

schema.title: Response Relationtool Add Feedback Api Workflows Relationtool  Workflow Id  Add Feedback Post

post.description:
Submits a manually edited draft for evaluation.

**Frontend Integration:**
-   This endpoint is used when a user manually edits a draft and wants to have it graded.
-   The submitted draft is ALWAYS treated as a **new version**.
-   A new `draft_id` will be assigned to it, following the pattern `{main_workflow_id}_v{next_version_number}`.
-   This new version will be added to the `create_reply_results` list.
-   A new evaluation will be triggered for this new draft version.

schema.title: Response Relationtool Evaluate Draft Api Workflows Relationtool  Workflow Id  Evaluate Draft Post

post.description:
Adds new documents to a running workflow.
This allows providing documents that were identified as missing in a previous draft.
This action does NOT automatically trigger a new draft generation; that must be done separately.

document_type.title: Document Type
document_type.description: Type of the document, e.g., 'email', 'doc', etc.

information.title: Information
information.description: List of document analyses for the case

data.description: Raw data of the case, if available

docs_analysis.description: Analysis of the documents in the case

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Dictionary of attributes with categories as keys and lists of attributes as values

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Mode of the content: 'bytes' for binary data, 'string' for text, 'b64' for base64 encoded data, 'url' for a URL to the content

mime.title: Mime
mime.description: MIME type of the content, e.g., 'application/pdf' for PDF files

content.title: Content
content.description: Content of the document as a string, bytes or URL

draft_id.title: Draft Id
draft_id.description: Unique identifier for this draft, including a version suffix (e.g., '_v1').

refined_from_draft_id.title: Refined From Draft Id
refined_from_draft_id.description: The ID of the draft this version was refined from, establishing a lineage.

creator_model.title: Creator Model
creator_model.description: The specific model used to create this draft (e.g., 'gpt-5').

is_refined.title: Is Refined
is_refined.description: True if this draft is a refinement of a previous one.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A brief, high-level summary of the drafted reply's strategy.

reasoning.title: Reasoning
reasoning.description: Detailed explanation of the key strategic choices made in the draft.

reviewer_instructions.title: Reviewer Instructions
reviewer_instructions.description: Specific points for the reviewing lawyer to double-check.

annexes.title: Annexes
annexes.description: A complete list of all annexes used in the reply.

missing_documents.title: Missing Documents
missing_documents.description: List of documents mentioned by the counterparty but not provided, which could improve the draft.

reply_draft.title: Reply Draft
reply_draft.description: The full, complete Replik draft in Markdown format.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Brief summary of the draft's strategy

evaluation_count.title: Evaluation Count
evaluation_count.description: Total number of evaluations for this draft

latest_grade.title: Latest Grade
latest_grade.description: Most recent overall grade (same as all_evaluations[-1].overall_grade if exists)

is_selected.title: Is Selected
is_selected.description: Whether this is the currently selected default draft

all_evaluations.title: All Evaluations
all_evaluations.description: All evaluations for this draft, in chronological order

refined_from_draft_id.title: Refined From Draft Id
refined_from_draft_id.description: The ID of the draft this version was refined from.

refinement_lineage.title: Refinement Lineage
refinement_lineage.description: A complete, ordered list of draft IDs from the origin of this refinement chain to this version.

DraftEvaluationsSummary-Input.title: DraftEvaluationsSummary
DraftEvaluationsSummary-Input.description: Summary information for a single draft with all its evaluations.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Brief summary of the draft's strategy

evaluation_count.title: Evaluation Count
evaluation_count.description: Total number of evaluations for this draft

latest_grade.title: Latest Grade
latest_grade.description: Most recent overall grade (same as all_evaluations[-1].overall_grade if exists)

is_selected.title: Is Selected
is_selected.description: Whether this is the currently selected default draft

all_evaluations.title: All Evaluations
all_evaluations.description: All evaluations for this draft, in chronological order

refined_from_draft_id.title: Refined From Draft Id
refined_from_draft_id.description: The ID of the draft this version was refined from.

refinement_lineage.title: Refinement Lineage
refinement_lineage.description: A complete, ordered list of draft IDs from the origin of this refinement chain to this version.

DraftEvaluationsSummary-Output.title: DraftEvaluationsSummary
DraftEvaluationsSummary-Output.description: Summary information for a single draft with all its evaluations.

model.title: Model
model.description: Global model override - applies to ALL agents unless overridden in 'agents'

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: Alias mappings to merge with existing configuration for this run

agents.title: Agents
agents.description: Per-agent model configuration overrides. Keys are agent name_id values.

DynamicAgentConfig.title: DynamicAgentConfig
DynamicAgentConfig.description: Runtime configuration overrides for agents in a workflow.

agent_config.description: Dynamic agent configuration as a JSON object. If provided, this will override the workflow's current agent configuration for the evaluation.

workflow_status.title: Workflow Status
workflow_status.description: The current status of the workflow execution.

original_workflow_id.title: Original Workflow Id
original_workflow_id.description: The ID of the parent workflow that initiated this evaluation task.

draft_id.title: Draft Id
draft_id.description: The ID of the draft being evaluated.

is_merged.title: Is Merged
is_merged.description: True if this is a merged evaluation, False otherwise.

evaluation.description: The resulting evaluation (either single or merged).

original_evaluations.title: Original Evaluations
original_evaluations.description: For merged evaluations, this contains the list of original evaluations that were merged.

ExteriorKeyword.title: ExteriorKeyword
ExteriorKeyword.description: Enum for keywords to identify exterior photos.

general_features.title: General Features
general_features.description: A list of general features to look for across all photos.

room_features.title: Room Features
room_features.description: A dictionary mapping location names to specific features to look for in those locations.

FeaturesConfig.title: FeaturesConfig
FeaturesConfig.description: Configuration for features to look for in photos.

importance.title: Importance
importance.description: The importance of the feedback for the grade.

document_name.title: Document Name
document_name.description: The name or description of the missing document.

reason_for_request.title: Reason For Request
reason_for_request.description: Explanation of why this document is needed and how it could affect the draft.

ModelSettings.title: ModelSettings
ModelSettings.description:
Settings to use when calling an LLM.

This class holds optional model configuration parameters (e.g. temperature,
top_p, penalties, truncation, etc.).

Not all models/providers support all of these parameters, so please check the API documentation
for the specific model and provider you are using.

source.description: Detailed source information for the photo.

location.title: Location
location.description: The location depicted in the photo (e.g., Kitchen, Bathroom, Building Exterior).

condition.description: The assessed condition of the location.

features.title: Features
features.description: A list of identified features (e.g., bathtub, wooden floor, high ceiling).

estimated_building_year.title: Estimated Building Year
estimated_building_year.description: The estimated construction year of the building, if applicable.

reasoning.title: Reasoning
reasoning.description: Reasoning behind the analysis, especially for condition and year estimation.

rooms.title: Rooms
rooms.description: A list of rooms, each with its grouped photo analyses.

building_exterior.title: Building Exterior
building_exterior.description: Analyses of photos of the building's exterior or common areas.

summary.description: An overall summary of the property analysis.

pdf_report_full_url.title: Pdf Report Full Url
pdf_report_full_url.description: The S3 path to the full, verbose PDF report.

pdf_report_concise_url.title: Pdf Report Concise Url
pdf_report_concise_url.description: The S3 path to the concise PDF report (summary, titles, photos only).

pdf_report_minimal_url.title: Pdf Report Minimal Url
pdf_report_minimal_url.description: The S3 path to the minimal PDF report (photos only, grouped by category).

PhotoAnalyzerOutput.title: PhotoAnalyzerOutput
PhotoAnalyzerOutput.description: Output of the photo analyzer workflow.

photos.title: Photos
photos.description: A list of photos to be analyzed. Each can be an image or a PDF.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: A list of possible conditions to assess.

exterior_keywords.title: Exterior Keywords
exterior_keywords.description: Keywords to identify exterior or common area photos.

features_config.description: Specific features to guide the analysis.

PhotoAnalyzerWorkflowInput.title: PhotoAnalyzerWorkflowInput
PhotoAnalyzerWorkflowInput.description: Input for the photo analyzer workflow.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: The original filename of the source file (e.g., 'document.pdf').

page_number.title: Page Number
page_number.description: The page number if the source is from a PDF.

original_uri.title: Original Uri
original_uri.description: The original S3 URI of the file, if applicable.

original_content_b64.title: Original Content B64
original_content_b64.description: The original content in base64, if provided directly.

original_mime_type.title: Original Mime Type
original_mime_type.description: The MIME type of the original file.

split_photo_uri.title: Split Photo Uri
split_photo_uri.description: The S3 URI of the image extracted from a PDF page.

mime_type.title: Mime Type
mime_type.description: The MIME type of the processed file (e.g., the extracted image).

source_type.description: The type of the original source (uri or base64).

overall_description.title: Overall Description
overall_description.description: A short, engaging description of the property for a potential buyer.

consolidated_building_year.title: Consolidated Building Year
consolidated_building_year.description: The consolidated estimated building year based on all available data.

overall_condition.title: Overall Condition
overall_condition.description: The overall condition of the property.

key_features.title: Key Features
key_features.description: A bullet-point list of the most important features of the property.

PhotoSummaryOutput.title: PhotoSummaryOutput
PhotoSummaryOutput.description: A summary report of the entire property analysis.

relation_table.title: Relation Table
relation_table.description: The relation table output from the evidence agent.

court_statement_reply.description: The court statement reply written by the lawyer.

workflow_id_to_reconcile.title: Workflow Id To Reconcile
workflow_id_to_reconcile.description: The workflow ID of the relation tool run being reconciled.

other_documents.title: Other Documents
other_documents.description: List of other documents to compare with the claim and defense

documents_not_provided_by_defendant.title: Documents Not Provided By Defendant
documents_not_provided_by_defendant.description: List of document names mentioned by the defendant but not provided.

reply_examples.title: Reply Examples
reply_examples.description: List of example replies to the claim and defense

reply_snippets.title: Reply Snippets
reply_snippets.description: List of lawyer-written snippets to use for generating the reply.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Dictionary of attributes with categories as keys and lists of attributes as values

topics.title: Topics
topics.description: A list of specific legal topics to look for in the documents.

relationtable_feedback.title: Relationtable Feedback
relationtable_feedback.description: List of structured feedback items for the relation table agent

relationtable_feedbacks.title: Relationtable Feedbacks
relationtable_feedbacks.description: List of simple text feedback for the relation table agent

feedbacks.title: Feedbacks
feedbacks.description: List of structured feedback items for the draft reply

initial_draft.description: Optional initial draft to refine from the start. If provided, the workflow will evaluate and refine this draft instead of generating from scratch.

to_language.title: To Language
to_language.description: The language to translate the summary to. E.g., 'en' for English, 'de' for German.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Metadata for the relation tool input

case_info.description: Information about the case, if available

only_disagreement.title: Only Disagreement
only_disagreement.description: List only disagreement, if false, list all attributes

include_case_docs.title: Include Case Docs
include_case_docs.description: Include case documents from Conny in the context

run_document_analysis.title: Run Document Analysis
run_document_analysis.description: Whether to run the document analysis step

run_legal_analysis.title: Run Legal Analysis
run_legal_analysis.description: Whether to run the legal argument analysis step

run_create_reply.title: Run Create Reply
run_create_reply.description: Whether to run the create reply step

run_draft_evaluation.title: Run Draft Evaluation
run_draft_evaluation.description: Whether to run the draft evaluation step after creating a reply

run_timeout_days.title: Run Timeout Days
run_timeout_days.description: How long the interactive workflow should wait for updates, in days.

use_reply_examples.title: Use Reply Examples
use_reply_examples.description: Whether to use reply examples for the first draft.

relation_table.title: Relation Table
relation_table.description: A list of table rows with the comparison between the entities in the claim and defense

relation_table.title: Relation Table
relation_table.description: A list of table rows with the comparison between the entities in the claim and defense

document_a_value.title: Document A Value
document_a_value.description: Value of the attribute in the document A

quote_a.title: Quote A
quote_a.description: Quote from the document A supporting the attribute

document_b_value.title: Document B Value
document_b_value.description: Value of the attribute in the document B

quote_b.title: Quote B
quote_b.description: Quote from the document B supporting the attribute

evidence_provided_b.title: Evidence Provided B
evidence_provided_b.description: Whether there is evidence in document B for the attribute

evidence_b.title: Evidence B
evidence_b.description: Evidence supporting the attribute in the document B

evidence_quote_b.title: Evidence Quote B
evidence_quote_b.description: Quote from the document B supporting the attribute

reasoning.title: Reasoning
reasoning.description: Reasoning for the status of disagreement/agreement of the attribute

agreement_status.title: Agreement Status
agreement_status.description: Status of the attribute: True if agree, FAlse otherwise

agreement_reason.description: The detailed reason for the agreement status.

photos.title: Photos
photos.description: A list of analyses for photos of this location.

combined_features.title: Combined Features
combined_features.description: A combined list of unique features observed across all photos of this location.

overall_condition.title: Overall Condition
overall_condition.description: The overall assessed condition of the room.

reasoning.title: Reasoning
reasoning.description: Summary reasoning for the overall condition assessment.

estimated_building_year.title: Estimated Building Year
estimated_building_year.description: Overall estimated building year for the property, if applicable.

location.title: Location
location.description: The location name for this room analysis (e.g., 'Kitchen', 'Bathroom 1').

RoomAnalysisOutput.title: RoomAnalysisOutput
RoomAnalysisOutput.description: Output model for room analysis, identical to RoomAnalysis but used for clarity in responses.

SourceType.title: SourceType
SourceType.description: Enum for the type of the original source.

feedbacks.title: Feedbacks
feedbacks.description: List of feedbacks for creating the less verbose text

to_language.title: To Language
to_language.description: The language to translate the summary to. E.g., 'en' for English, 'de' for German.

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the topic to look for.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the topic.

steps.description: The steps in the workflow execution graph

trace_id.title: Trace Id
trace_id.description: The trace ID for the workflow execution, used for tracing and debugging

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: The session ID for the workflow execution, used for session management

steps.description: The steps in the workflow execution graph

trace_id.title: Trace Id
trace_id.description: The trace ID for the workflow execution, used for tracing and debugging

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: The session ID for the workflow execution, used for session management

total_evaluations.title: Total Evaluations
total_evaluations.description: Total number of evaluations across all drafts

selected_draft_id.title: Selected Draft Id
selected_draft_id.description: The currently selected default draft ID, if any

auto_selected_draft_id.title: Auto Selected Draft Id
auto_selected_draft_id.description: The draft ID with the best evaluation from the latest version, selected automatically.

draft_ids_ordered.title: Draft Ids Ordered

drafts.title: Drafts
drafts.description: Dictionary of drafts keyed by draft_id for O(1) lookup

WorkflowStepStatus.title: WorkflowStepStatus

Enumeration of possible statuses for a workflow step,
aligned with high-level
    Temporal execution states and application-specific logic.

contested.title: Contested
contested.description: Whether the attribute is contested (True) or not (False)

category.title: Category
